jumbotron.title: Welcome!
jumbotron.body: This is the personal site of Joel Detweiler. I'm a full-stack software engineer working as a Senior JavaScript Developer at iFit. This is a site to find information about me and some of the things I'm working on. If you like what you see and want to work together, reach out to me and let's talk.

sideBarItems.title: About This Site
sideBarItems.body: I am building this site myself and including all source code in my GitHub page. All content is generated using straightforward templates, so this site could be easily forked and re-used. You can read about how I did it on my blog .

sideBarItems.title: I'm Mobile Friendly!
sideBarItems.body: Check me out as if you were on a smartphone here.

resume.name: Joel Detweiler
resume.title: Full Stack Developer
resume.aboutMe: I'm a full-stack engineer with a passion for working on new and growing products - I love starting new projects, learning new languages, and finding the best framework for the project. I'm skilled at assembling existing tools to create something great with minimal overhead. I work efficiently and flexibily, and I'm used to wearing many hats.

experience.title: Senior JavaScript Developer
items: Used React and Redux to build

experience.title: Full-Stack Developer
items: Ownership over all front end development of company site using AngularJS and AWS.
Database work using MongoDB and PostgreSQL.
Managed collection and display of key company analytics.
Implemented Selenium framework for automated site testing.

experience.title: Associate Software Engineer
items: First developer on a team working on new products for life science companies.
Developed rich client-side UIs using JavaScript, jQuery, and AngularJS.
Built a complex back end and RESTful APIs in Java.
Integrated all work with the Salesforce data platform.

experience.title: Student Intern
items: Performed original Machine Learning research with applications to computer security.
Used Markov Chains and Hidden Markov Models to detect anomalies in network connection data.

education.name: Pomona College
items: Thesis: Updatable Learning of Support Vector Machines
